name: Feed the pigs!
description:
Feed the pigs with all your carrots before the timer runs out.

 Move with WASD and feed a pig by walk near it.

 This game was made for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3

I will make a video about this game on my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHVQiCP0-g95CIX3C2RiooQ
